view

Class DailyView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • view.DailyView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class DailyView
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    Classe Serata view che contiene tutti i componenti grafici per interfacciarsi con il cameriere e tutti i metodi per gestirli.
    Author:
    Mauro
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
